summary:
- **Drilling Program Commenced**: RC drilling contractor mobilised to Pharos Gold Project, targeting high-grade gold zones (Oliver’s Patch, Cap Lamp, Lantern, etc.).  
- **Historic High-Grade Intercepts**: Notable results include:  
  - 8m @ 10.99 g/t Au (Lantern), 7m @ 8.33 g/t Au (Lantern), 5m @ 8.28 g/t Au (Cap Lamp).  
- **Upcoming Catalysts**:  
  - 1,500m drilling to complete by late July; first assays expected shortly after.  
  - ~1,000 samples pending analysis (results mid-July).  
- **Resource Mention**: Mt Mulcahy JORC Resource (647kt @ 2.4% Cu, 1.8% Zn, 20g/t Ag).  

*No material capital markets or liquidity impacts identified (operational update only).*
